doc:
Sharon Lynn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sharon_Lynn 0 Sharon Lynn (born D'Auvergne Sharon Lindsay, April 9, 1901 – May 26, 1963) was an American actress and singer. She began playing in silent films but enjoyed her biggest success in the early sound years of motion pictures before fading away in the mid 1930s. She is perhaps best known for portraying Lola Marcel, the villain in the Laurel and Hardy comedy feature, Way Out West. Sharon_Lynn ( born D'Auvergne_Sharon_Lindsay , April_9_,_1901 – May_26_,_1963 ) was an_American_actress_and_singer . She is_perhaps_best_known for portraying Lola_Marcel , the_villain in the_Laurel_and_Hardy_comedy_feature , Way Out West .
